title: Index Pointing At The Viewer Dark Skin Tone
description: A hand with the index finger pointing directly at the viewer, with a dark skin tone. This emoji can be used to draw attention, make a direct accusation, or indicate 'you'.
apple_vendor_description: The index finger pointing directly at the viewer, rendered in a dark skin tone on Apple devices, is a bold and direct gesture. Apple‚Äôs design imbues this emoji with a sharp, defined appearance, thanks to its characteristic glossy 3D shading and precise lighting, making the fingertip stand out. It's commonly used to draw attention, make a specific point, or indicate a selection, adding a commanding presence to digital conversations.
